PAUSE POINT 2:  JUST BEFORE PUSHING 
(or before Caesarean) 
Checking the mother just before pushing 
(or before Caesarean) is important to 
detect and treat complications that can 
occur during labour and to prepare for 
routine events and possible crisis situations 
that may occur after birth.
